price: 134. Ciertamente, lo que os ha sido prometido sucederá y no podréis hacer nada por impedirlo.
arabic: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَأٓتٖۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna mā tūʿadūna laātin wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
